## createReduxRootStore() function

Constructs a new store that can handle feature modules.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function createReduxRootStore(aDependencies: any, aPreLoadedState?: ReduxRootState): ReduxRootStore;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aDependencies | <code>any</code> | the dependencies that will be injected into the epics |
|  aPreLoadedState | <code>ReduxRootState</code> | optionally an initial state object |

<b>Returns:</b>

`ReduxRootStore`

the store. Use the [ReduxRootStore.addFeatureModule()](./redux-store.reduxrootstore.addfeaturemodule.md) method to register a feature module.
